meta.query: #女子名叫丽春多次申请改名被拒#

response.query: #女子名叫丽春多次申请改名被拒#
response.share_text: #女子名叫丽春多次申请改名被拒#的相关内容，来智搜看看
response.msg:
嗯，用户查询的是关于"女子名叫丽春多次申请改名被拒"的新闻事件。看了一下搜索结果，这个事件在四川广元旺苍县发生，挺多媒体都报道了。

媒体账号的报道比较详细。这个女子因为名字"丽春"从小被嘲笑，精神受伤害，跑了4次派出所申请改名都被驳回。公安局刚开始说名字没歧义不给改，还让她去开精神伤害证明。这个要求挺奇怪的，要证明名字伤害了自己？

看到法律方面有冲突。《民法典》明明说公民有权改名，但四川当地2018年出了个工作规程，说成年人原则上不能改名，只有几种特殊情况才行。律师李勇说得对，公民改名不该附加条件。

有意思的是，网民反应很强烈。好多人质问：为什么有人能改成"朱雀玄武"这种名字，普通百姓改个名这么难？这不是双重标准吗？

最新进展是省公安厅回应了，说发现地方法规和上位法有冲突，正在修订工作规程，明年会出新规。同时旺苍警方松口了，说等女子补了材料就给她办改名。

这件事反映的问题其实挺深的。行政管理方便和公民权利之间怎么平衡？为什么基层执行会有这么大差异？可能真要等新规出来才能根本解决。


关于四川旺苍县女子因名字“丽春”多次申请改名被拒的事件，综合多方信息及最新进展，核心事实与争议焦点如下：
### 一、事件核心经过
1. **改名诉求与多次驳回**
四川广元旺苍县一女子因名字“丽春”长期遭受他人嘲笑辱骂，认为该名导致其精神心理伤害，先后4次前往派出所、2次提交改名申请，均被旺苍县公安局以“名字无歧义”“理由不充分”为由驳回。工作人员称需证明名字存在歧义或违反公序良俗方可更改。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 4, "data": {"num": [1, 4, 7], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "封面新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229554142806851", "index": 1, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "澎湃新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229549105184783", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "深圳新闻网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229576771867392", "index": 7, "label": ""}], "name": "封面新闻", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.690.690.50/001DitQply8h8vhzzl20mj60j60j6jrn02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762331557&ssig=eO8vDFPFpa", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229554142806851", "vType": 3}}```

2. **警方调整处理方案**
在舆论关注后，旺苍县公安局联系该女子，要求其补充医院开具的“精神伤害证明”，以此佐证原名对其造成心理伤害。警方表示，若材料齐全将批准改名申请。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 5, "data": {"num": [1, 4, 31], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "澎湃新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229549105184783", "index": 4, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "封面新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229554142806851", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "维度新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229570800226153", "index": 31, "label": ""}], "name": "澎湃新闻", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.11.10.275.275.50/005vnhZYly8ftjmwo0bx4j308c08cq32.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762331557&ssig=24VEdC2Esj", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229549105184783", "vType": 3}}```

3. **最终进展**
据最新通报，女子在补齐材料后改名申请已获批准。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 6, "data": {"num": [31], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "维度新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229570800226153", "index": 31, "label": "大v"}], "name": "维度新闻", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/006zZ3uwly8hi9plwvkmhj30u00u0wf8.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762331557&ssig=PKf%2BtZi2hz", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229570800226153", "vType": 3}}```
### 二、争议焦点：法律法规与地方执行的冲突
- **公民权利保障层面**
- **《民法典》规定**：自然人享有姓名权，有权依法变更姓名，只要不违背公序良俗（如谐音低俗、违反道德）。律师指出，公民改名权不应附加额外条件。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 10, "data": {"num": [2, 4, 30, 33], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "三湘都市报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229595171230283", "index": 2, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "澎湃新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229549105184783", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "夏日海湾", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229609684569446", "index": 30, "label": ""}, {"name": "四川日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229366032468728", "index": 33, "label": ""}], "name": "三湘都市报", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.179.179.50/001R3oqEly8h8vg5q4wzdj604z04z3yf02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762331557&ssig=f8QHLahMzi", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229595171230283", "vType": 3}}```
- **四川省地方规程限制**：依据2018年《全省公安机关户政管理工作规程（试行）》，成年人原则上不允许改名，仅限五种情形（如谐音违背公序良俗、含冷僻字等）。警方据此认定“丽春”无歧义，拒绝申请。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 11, "data": {"num": [4, 5, 33], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "四川日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229366032468728", "index": 33, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "澎湃新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229549105184783", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "成都条条通", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229572725145762", "index": 5, "label": ""}], "name": "四川日报", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/003skQFsly8haoyynb4x7j60go0gogmx02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762331557&ssig=oFIQvSczLr", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229366032468728", "vType": 3}}```

- **执行标准矛盾**
- 网民质疑：此前有案例（如改名“朱雀玄武敕令”）成功更名，但“丽春”改名却受阻，暴露执行尺度不统一。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 13, "data": {"num": [8, 26], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "醒着先生", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229614557562893", "index": 8, "label": ""}, {"name": "迟遇讨厌吃鱼", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229609337753211", "index": 26, "label": ""}]}}```
- 警方要求“精神证明”引发争议：公众认为此举增加公民负担，且精神伤害的医学证明与姓名权无必然关联，被指过度设槛。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 14, "data": {"num": [7, 21, 23], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "深圳新闻网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229576771867392", "index": 7, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "这里一只小肥啾", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229610650567565", "index": 21, "label": ""}, {"name": "这里有早餐吃", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229609859681722", "index": 23, "label": ""}], "name": "深圳新闻网", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.10.22.172.172.50/70f4e244ly8h8vgzbksu6j205f05fdfp.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762331557&ssig=kX%2FY4VqXvL", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229576771867392", "vType": 3}}```
### 三、制度性问题的解决方向
1. **省级部门回应修订规程**
四川省公安厅双基总队确认，现行户政规程中与《民法典》冲突的条款正在修订，新规预计2026年出台，将更注重保障公民姓名权。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 17, "data": {"num": [1, 2, 33], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "封面新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229554142806851", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "三湘都市报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229595171230283", "index": 2, "label": ""}, {"name": "四川日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229366032468728", "index": 33, "label": ""}]}}```

2. **法律救济途径**
若符合法定条件仍被拒，公民可向上级公安机关申请行政复议或提起行政诉讼。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 18, "data": {"num": [2, 30], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "三湘都市报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229595171230283", "index": 2, "label": ""}, {"name": "夏日海湾", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229609684569446", "index": 30, "label": ""}]}}```
### 四、舆论观点分歧
| **立场** | **代表性观点** |
|-------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| **支持改名自由** | “丽春”易关联“丽春院”（古代妓院），实际造成困扰，行政应尊重个体感受。 |
| **质疑执行标准** | 要求“精神证明”是刁难，与“朱雀玄武”改名对比显失公平。 |
| **担忧管理成本** | 频繁改名可能增加社会管理难度（如征信、犯罪记录追溯）。 |

```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 20, "data": {"num": [8, 18, 21, 24, 26, 27, 29], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "多味枫糖", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229606303958701", "index": 29, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "醒着先生", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229614557562893", "index": 8, "label": ""}, {"name": "拿到太阳底下晒晒", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229611594026439", "index": 18, "label": ""}, {"name": "这里一只小肥啾", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229610650567565", "index": 21, "label": ""}, {"name": "英赛伦", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229609491632005", "index": 24, "label": ""}, {"name": "迟遇讨厌吃鱼", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229609337753211", "index": 26, "label": ""}, {"name": "星闻小主", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229613489063401", "index": 27, "label": ""}], "name": "多味枫糖", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/b1325571ly8hvet40fw49j20u00u0wge.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762331557&ssig=Sd%2BWvXSNUn", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229606303958701", "vType": 0}}```
### 五、事件启示
1. **基层执法需与法律同步**：地方规定滞后于《民法典》精神，导致权利落地受阻。
2. **人性化执行必要性**：姓名关联个人尊严，行政审核应避免机械套用条文，需结合实际情况（如长期遭受歧视）综合判断。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 24, "data": {"num": [6, 28], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "相煜晚", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229610351986769", "index": 6, "label": ""}, {"name": "爱之幻乐小鸟", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229606623250620", "index": 28, "label": ""}]}}```
3. **制度优化方向**：新规应明确“公序良俗”的判定标准，简化合理改名流程，减少自由裁量空间。

> 此事件折射出个体权益与行政规范的深层碰撞，也推动制度向更尊重公民人格权的方向进化。2026年四川省户政新规的落地，将成为观察基层治理现代化的重要窗口。
